content.detailedDescription:
Firstly i should state i live in texas in whodah nowhere, in a small nondescript town where nothing happens, and life is pretty damn boring. i live on a small ranch, and i am a gun toting, country living girl and with all that said i don't think any of it will keep me safe from what's been happening. 

first occurrence:

i was outside with my husband, it was late at night and we had just gotten home from work and errands; i had stopped to look at the stars and i saw what seemed to be just a star although it was abnormally bright and shone blue. 
 my husband was walking into the house when i realized it wasn't a star, i urged him over and he returned slowly whilst looking up to the sky; the blue light flew over head very slowly and the silhouette of the thing was barely visible, i thought it was a drone because the silhouette of it was t shaped, it passed over head and disappeared.

second occurrence: 

my husband awoke earlier than usual to get to work early and i was going in early with him, while i was getting ready for the day he went outside to take our dogs to the bathroom and felt the strange sensation of being watched, when he looked toward sthe direction he sensed the "watching" from he saw the blue light in the sky and it rocketed off abruptly leaving a blue tail streaking behind it and then it was gone all together. 
he came in and told me, we were on edge however we got ready and started out journey to work. as the sun was coming up over the hills and we were chatting and talking there was a strange sound and before out eyes there was the same blue light and it streaked across the sky at supsonic speed leaving a faint trail of blue behind it as it rocketed towards the sun coming over the horizon. we were speechless. 

third occurrence: 

i spent my day home off work and was doing chores, being goofy and watching movies with my mom and spending quality time with her, a nondescript day and nothing to cause alarm, however around 3 in the afternoon when we were in separate parts of the house i heard to me what sounded like thunder but while it happened i was looking out my window, it was breezy and cloudless sunny day. my mother thought it was a tornado, pretty common in our part of the country. my dogs were outside on their leashes so they could go potty and they were both freaking out, howling, whining, and running back and forth at the edge of their leashes. 
 i ran outside to get them in case it was a tornado, i left the front door open as usual so my two dogs run inside, my big husky got away from my grasp and ran towards a huge mess in the driveway that was not there, he stopped at the edge of the driveway and glared into our forest, the hair was on edge on his back and he was growling. 
 i ran over to grab him and saw the mess that was not there before, we had truck tires stacked that we needed to take over to the shop to get put on our vehicle and the tire was across the driveway next to the treeline and it was steaming, steaming like a cup of coffee steams right after you pour it. i grabbed him and rushed him inside, i could still hear the weird thundering sound surrounding our county, but then it went away. 

fourth occurrence: 

i went out with my parents for our weekly, evening bible study and came home with my parents, while our gate was opening i could see a silhouette standing by the backdoor of our house, i thougth it was my husband, he had decided to stay home because he was sick, i pointed at the silhouette and asked why my husband  was standing outside waiting for us, my mother saw saw it too and said she didn't know why, we came through the gate and went around the small corner of our driveway and the silhouette was gone. 
 when we went inside i found my husband was asleep in our room, i asked him why he came outside and he replied that he had been asleep for 4 hours.
 so now i must further explain this last occurance, my husband is 6'3, he is a tall guy who is very muscular, however the following day when i was showing him where i saw the silhouette i got chill down my back as i realized whatever i saw was 2 feet taller than him and almost double his width in shoulder and arm shape. 


fifth occurrence: 
on 1/1/16
we had a bbq with our family friends and the evening consisted of fireworks and bonfires, however after everyone left my husband was sitting at the kindling fire pit with our husky. i had gone inside because of a severe headache and he was alone. 
our dog was on edge my husband said, pacing and growling at the tree line beside out gate entrance to our ranch, he wandered off and would not return to his usual commands. 
my husband used his typical, advanced-skill whistle for our husky, an abnormal sing-song sort of whistle that is very difficult to copy, as the dog came running back to my husband there was something by the gate, two acres away mimicked the whistle in its entirety. 
the dog sat beside my husband and was deep guttural growling in the direction where out gate is; my husband whistled a complex whistle again, and it was mimicked back at him.
my husband rose from his seat to come inside and whistled at our dog to follow, and there was a third mimic of the whistle, only this time it was much louder.
content.summary: A week of strange occurances, ufo in the sky following us, and then weirdness around our house.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work, around 11:00pm, 1-1-2016, then noticed a very bright orange/red ball of light in sky to the north west. first thought it was mars, but it was moving slowly, no trail, traveling north from a higher degree in the sky to a lower degree, then figured it must be a plane, but light was not blinking nor were there other colored lights like planes have. it continued in a northerly direction. stopped in store parking lot to get cell out to take pictures, one still zoomed and one short video but too far away for any details.  went in to shop, it was gone when i returned to my car.
content.summary: Orange/red flairlike ball moving north from higher to lower in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My partner was leaving the house for work and i was kissing him goodbye at the door when he looked up to his right and said "no way" i looked out and saw a massive saucer shaped craft hovering in the air stationary emanating white light from the centre of its circumference in sequence from windows; white; white; white; red; white then white again. but we did not stand out and study for long. my partner told me to go into the house and we hid until it was gone and when it had he left for work.

had i of been alone i would have done the opposite. 

now might also be the time to report that i personally have been seeing the same lights since i was a child. along with other members of my immediate family. in the past i have experienced strange things but for fear of being ridiculed and people thinking i was making it up. have never reported them. 

i am however convinced that there is more going on. i try not to be scared of my encounters but instead grateful for them. 

my advice to anyone who is a non believer in these things. start looking up more.
content.summary: Large saucer shaped object observed in basingstoke england in early hours of new years morning.

content.detailedDescription:
Time: 0001 january, 1st 2016

location: (north) auburn, wa

shortly after midnight i went outside onto the balcony of my apartment, with my two year old daughter, looking for fireworks. i spotted a blazing light in the sky to the south, climbing from the horizon as it travelled at a westward trajectory. it very bright and of an orangish/golden hue. i had first assumed it to be a new year's eve firework of some sort, but it continued for several minutes, moving across the clear sky in a huge arc. when the light had reached directly east of my location, it dropped back in a half circle, slowing slightly, before  rising very high into the sky. i was craning my neck to look up at the object, which had risen to approximately 75 degrees from the horizon. it then hovered, perfectly still, the golden light unblinking, for nearly two minutes before the light dimmed to a faint glow and i lost sight of it. i viewed this entire event with reservation, trying simply to identify the nature of the object before i reacted to dismiss it or, contrarily, to become alarmed by it. i cannot come up with a satisfactory explanation for this object. i well know that the timing of the sighting throws it very much into question, but this was no firework that i witnessed. please contact me if you are able to explain my sighting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A gold/orange light blazing in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down hwy and noticed plane with a vapor trail starting to emmit. then noticed it pass a stationary obect. tried to watch it and watch the road at the same time but when i looked at the road and then looked back up in the sky the stationary object was gone. about 150 miles later i seen the object again just hovering there with a second object maybe half a mile away also stationary. started snapping photos with cell phone in quick succession hoping i would get atleast one decent photo.
content.summary: Stationary white objects. below the cloud line.

content.detailedDescription: I went to the soda machine and bought a soda about 0200 in the morning. the night was clear with almost no wind. on the way back to the emergency room i took a drink of soda as i walked between two buildings.  as i did this i noticed a huge v-shaped craft flying very slowly over me in a northerly direction.  it was a completely silent craft with a dull black and smooth exterior surface.  there were no rivets, windows, or panels that i could see.  the craft had 5 large, dimly lit, and round lights as i would initially think they were. there was one at the nose of the craft and two on each of the arms that formed the "v" of the craft.  the lit areas were almost as wide as the craft and i could see the stars and sky through them.  they were however not a constant lit area because they shimmered like a mirage does on a hot asphalt road.  that is when i thought they must be the propulsion devices of the craft.  the craft moved approximately 40-60 mph and i'm glad it did because it gave me more time to view it.  as i came out of the area between the two buildings, and into an open parking lot i noticed a security officer and called to him to look up.  he began cursing over and over until i had to tell him to shut up because i wanted to see if i could actually hear the propulsion device or any other sound the craft made.  nothing, not a sound, no wind, no heat, no magnetism, nothing.  the craft headed towards the vertical face of a mountain behind the place i work.  i thought to myself "it's going to crash into the mountain".  that's when it disappeared, blinked out, gone.  i do not remember how i got back inside the building of my job.  this incident has changed my life.  i no longer have to wonder if other life exists in the universe.  i know.
content.summary: V-shaped craft more than a thousand feet wide, black in color, with 5 large (round) see-through lights.  no sound was heard.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home and noticed a bright fireball object colors almost reddish orange with gold.  just ascending and hovering.  i brought attention to my daughter who was a passenger and we pulled over to record it but was not clear and truly visible with my phones low quality camera.  we watched for a bit in awe then rushed home to tell my husband.
content.summary: Bright fireball like object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Pulsating orange orbs recorded with cell phone. this happened during a move of furniture in tampa fl around 720pm
content.summary: Pulsating orange orbs

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my parent's place with my son & daughter this evening. as we walked down the driveway, my daughter exclaimed 'what's that?!' i looked up and saw an orange light in the sky flying from left to right, on a steady path. it was closer than a satellite would be, so i said it was probably an airplane. we watched it for a few minutes and got into the truck. then i kept watching it, because an airplane doesn't look so bright, nor does it look orange. at least, none that i've ever seen. i tried taping it with my cell phone. of course it looks a bazillion times smaller on my cell than it did with us just looking directly at it. as it flew by initially, it seemed higher in the sky. but as time went by, it seemed to be larger in appearance. like it was getting closer to the ground? even though it was still quite high in the sky. then suddenly it looked as though a flame was coming off of it, or under it. or a reflection of light was coming off of it? i can't explain it the way i saw it... and unfortunately my video doesn't do it justice. not one bit. i have no idea what it was. anyway, all of a sudden it stopped and just kinda sat motionless in the sky. then it started backtracking its 'flight path'. i thought that was kinda weird. it was too bright to be a helicopter. and planes don't do that. we don't have a military base nearby or anything weird like that around. it was a bit unsettling so i kinda grabbed my kids and we ran back into my parents home. kinda silly. i know. we stayed in there for a minute or so and went back outside and it was nowhere in sight. so we took off towards home (which would be in the 'left' direction from their place. as we left the neighbourhood and got onto the main road, my daughter claims she saw it on my side of the vehicle, tree-height, maybe 5 houses length away from the main road.  my parents live in a fairly wooded area on the slight outskirts of town. now, i can't confirm that sighting since i didn't see it myself. i dunno if i'm wasting anyone's time with this, but someone told me to report this to mufon and see if someone could enhance my video and picture, to see if they can see anything of value. i'm not sure it's possible, but it can't hurt- right?? anyway thanks for your time! (again, i'm super sorry that the picture and video is so crappy, and i turned off my video real quick because i thought i was wasting my time, and kinda freaked out lol but i don't know what kind of technology you folks have, so hopefully you can decipher this for me. i'm really interested in knowing what it might've been).
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange ball flew in sky left to right, stopped & flew back the way it came.

content.detailedDescription: I was researching the city of tars in the bible by using a method of code cypher that i had been working on. i was tired so i went to sleep. i at first i thought that i was dreaming, but i was standing in a small rounded niche that was ornately decorated with an intricate geometric pattern. the walls floors and equipments were all decorated this way. it was hammered bronze the structure was made of a thin bronze metal. there was a computer screen. on the screen was a code cypher program that was running on a page of text. there were objects that moved across the screen . they would highlight segments of text that could be interpreted as a code cypher. then a grey told me that there was something that i needed to know. he walked with me to a large white room this area was made of white plastic. there were these large powers balls, a fluid tension power ball. they resembled blackberries. they were made from some sort of black rubber material. they had check valves on them. the grey explained that these were fuel cells. they had liquefied sodium peroxide and water in separate bladders the skin of the power ball had water bladders and the inside was filled with sodium peroxide. then the short grey and a tall mantis like entity showed me an injector that empties the fuel cells. it has suction cups that seal and open the check valves. the pressure delivered by this pump is enormous the fluid tension power balls travel down tubes to the injector, the pump loads the fuel cell it opens the check valves and then presses the fuel out into the thrusters that the sodium peroxide powers. then it ejects the empty cell.They demonstrated the procedure for me to see. i was astonished at how powerful it was as the injector loaded the thrusters it jumped from bib to bib with a high rate of speed and amazing accuracy i could feel the explosion and the short period of thrust as the restricted pressure was released.. then the grey took me to a place in the vessel where exhaust pressures spin a turbine to make electricity. the chamber that made the exhaust was a reed slotted , pleat walled structure that was encapsulated in an engineered collapse zone . some of the bladders pumped fluids, instead of a machine doing it. i thought this was genius. they manufacture nitro methane on the vessel to burn in these "pistons". then the grey showed me a thruster up close it was a small one. it operated on a center line sheet metal bend that closed off the exhaust port the centerline bend sheet metal chamber expands to hold the pressurizing fuel. the exhaust port opens releasing gasses. this produces a robust thrust with a metered amount of sodium peroxide and water. then the mantis like entity took me to a room that was white and black, it was white lit there was a fuel cell filling machine in there. it was a pole that had octopus like arms on it .It had suction cups that opened the check valves. the machine was automated, it would pick up an empty flat cell, it would feel out the check valves with its tentacles, it would fill the cell up plump. then it would release the cell. the power ball then rolls away under the force of fluid tension. i joined two greys in a window overlooking earth. we were above massachusetts they were talking about suitable housing me in boston, they informed me that i was going there. then they tested a thruster so that i could see it from a window it shot fire and i realized that this vessel i was inside of was crescent shaped. the next thing that i remember is waking up at my reading table, i felt groggy and mentally exhausted.
content.summary: I was on a huge vessel and i was taught propulsion technology

content.detailedDescription: Looking out my bedroom window over the palisades on the hudson river. very clear night.  saw three lights kind of hovering that got brighter then dimmer and they seemed to sort of dart about.  no noise, and no faa airplane or helicopter lights.  watched for about 15 minutes and they were seen by my daughter and her boyfriend.  they finally blinked out and disappeared.  i thought, oh, more ufo's.  i've seen many weird anomolies living in the hudson valley all my life.
content.summary: Three lights hovering, blinking and moving quickly.  they changed size and brightness to naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 7:15pm on january 1st, 2016, i was taking the dog out to use the bathroom.  i was standing on the walkway to our front porch waiting for him to do his walk around the yard.  at roughly 7:19pm (based on the time of the photos), i noticed an inverted triangle in the southern sky, probably around 20 to 30 degrees above the horizon. (this would possibly place the lights a few miles east / northeast of birmingham, al since we are located roughly 15 miles northeast of the city.

when i noticed the lights, they drew my attention because they were much larger and brighter than any stars showing in the sky at the time.  the color of each light was also different than a star, appearing to be either a yellow/orange or orange color.  initially i believed it could possibly be some type of lanterns in the sky based on color and the time of the year (new years), but they stayed in that same tight triangle formation without wavering (like the lights were connected).  it also appeared that the triangle formation was rotating (the upper two lights appeared to rotate clockwise with the left light moving further away, all while maintaining the triangle formation.  i assume it is very possible that we had 3 lanterns tethered together forming a triangle, but with so many triangle formations reported over the years, i thought this worth a look and was very odd..  i have never seen anything like this in person before.

during the time i viewed it, the three lights moved very slowly east, and as i mentioned above, the formation appeared to be slowly rotating.  picture any triangle shape rotating slowly in a three dimensional space, with all corners staying at a consistent distance, and this is what i saw.  it appeared as though the upper left corner/light rotated away from me because of the shape changes of the formation, and the way that corner/light appeared to go a bit dimmer than the others when the shape changed. (you can see this in the last few pictures taken).

feelings while seeing the object was i guess complete surprise.  i have witnessed some fairly odd things in the sky over the years that may or may not have an explanation (could have been satellites, etc), but this was definitely something i have never seen before with my own eyes.  seen it on tv and other reports/videos from around the world, but never in person.  i'm still a bit in shock from what i saw.

the sighting lasted roughly 3-4 minutes probably, with the shape disappearing behind some fast moving clouds moving in from the south / southwest.  after the clouds moved in, i haven't seen anything else in the sky.  i was able to capture 11 pictures using my iphone 6, rear camera (sorry the quality isn't better, but phones don't take very good night sky pictures..)

this was also witnessed by my wife, mother, and daughter.  all viewed from the side of our front porch.
content.summary: Three slowly moving lights in shape of inverted triangle observed in southern sky, north of birmingham, al

content.detailedDescription: Bright object appeared out of nowhere, hovered briefly, than shot out of sight.
content.summary: Appeared out of nowhere, hovered briefly, than supersonic speed diagonally out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to smoke. noticed people setting off fireworks.  saw a gold/orangish glow. it was like a ball.  i waited for it to explode and it kept traveling west to east. as it kept going i thought it was a dud firework until it abruptly changed due south at a very low speed. because of the initial size, i thought it was a firework. as it was moving at a very low speed approximately 300 to 500 feet, i realized it could not have been a firework and it appeared to me, that the flight level was too high for any such firework.   being that it is dark, flight level is not confirmed. i captured a single shot and recorded 15 seconds, but being that it was dark, the quality isn't great.  i do not believe in ufo's, nor do i buy into conspiracy theories of such. but this event freaked me out and has me quite intrigued. we are in the flight path of mco.(orlando international airport)  this was not a commercial aircraft. too low and for the direction of travel. meaning, the planes usually fly behind the house, and this was in front.
 no known aircraft can make a 90 degree turn like that at low speed. it went south and i lost visual contact.  it is dark, but no cloud deck was observed. stars can be seen.
content.summary: Noticed it while fireworks were being set off. thought it was fireworks, until it kept traveling away from position.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my front yard listening to the gunshots of new years eve.
i saw a bright orangish light rising slowly in the east nearly straight up.
it looked like a big rocket launch off way in the distance.
it was moving near vertical slowly and making no sound for about 10 seconds, when it got to about 25 degrees above the horizon it started a slow turn towards more of a horizontal path climbing at roughly a 35 degree angle in what i estimate  a ese direction at about that time a second light launched right from the same spot and took the same flight path. the first light continued on path for about 20 more seconds. fading as it went, then at about the 30 second mark it abruptly went out. the second light did the same thing. my first thought was this was 2 very large rockets being launched. 
i have seen launches from vandenburg afb from this same address and they look almost the same. however i have never heard of a base in nevada  or east cali that is capable of launching such a rocket.
content.summary: 2 lights at a long distance rising and curving away

content.detailedDescription: I want to let you all know i saw an orb fly over richardson, tx. on december 23rd at 6:25-6:30pm i observed a bright orb while out taking my dog for a walk in my neighborhood. it came from the nw traveling se. i saw it about 10 days or so ago just after dusk. wasn't a plane. wasn't a satellite. wasn't a helicopter. there were planes in the area on approach to the various dallas airports. it was higher than any aircraft in the area but lower than any satellites that might be observed. in the 3-4 mins i observed the orb it traveled from north dallas to the south east and completely out of sight. it traveled in a straight path at a constant speed with no sound. i took a picture of the orb over head and shot a brief video. it was hard to see the orb on the video as the iphone is limited and it was moving at a relative high rate of speed.
content.summary: I want to let you all know i saw an orb fly over richardson, tx. came from the nw traveling se. i saw it about 10 days or so ago just after dusk. wasn't a plane. wasn't a satellite. wasn't a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was outside around 9:15 pm or so watching fireworks and called me out to see a solitary orb crossing the sky in a direct path.  i ran back inside to find my phone.  by the time i got back outside, the first one had passed and a second one appeared from the same location as the first one.  i took a digital picture of it.  it followed the same path as the first one and disappeared behind some clouds.  when the third one appeared, i began recording its travel until it disappeared as the other two did.  when i first saw it, i ran through a bunch of possibilities: helicopter, aircraft, glider, chinese lantern. it didn't blink, however, there was just a bright, solid, orange glow moving linearly across the sky.  it moved too quickly to be a lantern.  it was raining lightly at that time, and it was noisy from the fireworks.  i thought maybe it was an odd firework, but it was too slow to be an explosive projectile, too large, too round, and too slow to "burn out."  reactions:  why have i gone so long never seeing anything out of the ordinary, then in the last couple months see multiple solid sightings?  what is going on in the charleston area?  we do have a military base nearby. it took me nearly 24 hours to talk myself into posting this.  my husband encouraged me as well.
content.summary: Three bright solid orange orbs moved one by one across the sky and disappeared under cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: Outside in my backyard, i often take pictures of the changing skies, clouds that is. when i returned inside my home, i examined all the pictures and then some others i had taken during the month. this was definitely in october, november - december, 2015.  the image i saw showed the southern sky visible from my backyard seating area. i have an image with a v shaped ufo in it. the v shaped is black with at least 4 circular lights on each side and facing my direction, se of the object. by the terrain, trees etc, it was clearly visible it was hovering just over the trees, perhaps within a mile. it's size didn't seem particularly large, though it's difficult to tell at those heights.  i did not see it personally, but noticed it when i reviewed my pictures later. i mistakenly didn't rename the image, merely passed over it without so much as keeping it safe. i think it's among 50+ images and i've posted them on the web and have other people helping me find the image. as soon as i find it, i will post it here. until then, this is all i have.
content.summary: Examined pictures taken with phone and tablet. 2 pictures of ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my husband went to walk a dog at new year night, around 12:30am on january 1, 2016 and saw a bright red and orange light very quickly flying in dark sky.
we already went behind our condo building, we heard fireworks around our area.After one of the shoot of firework, i even said to my husband "look, here is firework" it was a very bright red and orange light appear over trees. it was moving from west to east.Also, it was too bright and stay light too long for firework.
our second thought it was a jet, it was moving very fast. my husband said"no its airplane and its look like on fire" 
after few second, we understand it can not be ether airplane or firework. object start change direction. first we thought it was going down, it became little bit bigger in size, and fly over our heads, very quickly went up. we continue watch this fireball, and understand, it was going more up and up. and finally we lost sight on east. it was look like just disappear in clouds.
we observe this bright light for about 2 minutes or so
content.summary: Bright red and orange fireball

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 1:30 am on january 1st, i was sitting outside and looking in th sky, all of a sudden a red orb was flying in a straight line. slower then anything i had ever seen before. after it flying for about 2 minutes it vanished in thin air. with about 30 seconds in between another orb fallowed. then 2 more did the same. so 4 orbs all together. my son was with me after the 2 one and see the 3 one vanish.

i always loved looking at the sky which is how i first notice the orb. at first i thought it might be a remnant of firework but seeing it move in a straight line for more then a minute confirmed that it was not a firework. the lack of clouds and smoke make it clearer.

i was also speaking in the phone with my mother and i yell at her that there was orbs in the sky. 

i had a feeling of déjà view and a bit of relief for some weird reason.

the orbs vanished which is when i lost sight of them. again their was no clouds in the sky as i could see stars where the orbs disappeared.

every time i tried taking picture, the orb would not show up, but we could see th stars.
content.summary: Orbs flees in a straight line for a few minutes and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Saw 4 total orange pulsating objects.I was at home going into my room in the garage and first noticed from corner of my eye. i first thought it was the street light because they are orange but this illuminated much brighter and was moving nothing like a normal plane or helicopter would.They where stationary hovered ascended and decended each pulsating differently. some brighter, faster,slower than others. after 5 mins i ran into to grab cam on cell phone to get video. when i came out they where gone.At this time it sounded like it was bagdad witb fire fights large and small bombs being detonated mixed with the 4 on the floor bass heavy rhythms from a couple of new years parties right next door. at first it was just one. but when they reappeared i got a total of 3 objects all in the same frame as a plane or helicopter passes between them. when passing overhead they came from south east direction(the normal flight path) to north west  all would stop glowing where my cam could not pick up an image but to naked eye they had a plasma luminescent like appearence. a thin texture like an insects wings. they rotated at a low pulse and looked organic and alive. i watched for about 30 mins. it was cold and had my kids over so i stopped observing to review video. in the video i noticed the object looked like it morphed but ill leave that up to you. the sighting made me excited because this is first i got actual video of. i felt the objects where there to observe the moment of new years countdown because los angeles erupts like a cataclysm. 
(for video send me an email because file is larger than 25mb via google drive)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Took video of 4 total orange pulsating objects. they rotated bright and low pulse and looked organic all at 12am exactly on the new year in los angeles.

content.detailedDescription:
New year's eve/2am new year's day, my roommate and i left the apartment to walk to the store - walking down back steps (facing east), we both saw a red-orange ball flying in a straight path northbound, possibly over the lake. we both studied it's movements: it flew in a straight line, descending and changing direction slightly (heading further eastward) after approximately 2-3 minutes. it suddenly disappeared, so we continued walking, only to pass a small group of people who had not seemed to have seen anything strange; after they passed us, the ball reappeared for approximately 1-2 more minutes, but then we lost sight of it as it descended and buildings obstructed our view. there were no fireworks at that time, nor were there any other aircrafts in the sky, which we found unusual because we usually see planes descending toward the airport all day and night.

the orb was reddish-orange in color, initially more red, with a matte/flat appearance and an orange-ish glow around the edges. the movements were very controlled, like an airplane's might be. when i first saw it, i assumed it was a light from a plane, but it was much too large for that and travelling the wrong direction. it was not the right shape to be an actual plane itself, but i thought it could maybe have been the light. my roommate disagreed, also stating she did not think it was a drone. it looked too large and close to be a satellite.
content.summary: Single red-orange sphere flying in straight line; disappears and reappears

content.detailedDescription: I work up and went downstairs to make breakfast and looked out the kitchen window to see if the moon was visible.It was.I could clearly see what was approximately less than a half moon.The sky was clear.As i start to close the blinds again,a bright object in the sky caught my attention.I reopened the blinds and starred at this bright group of rays and orbs.My first thought was to take pics.I grabbed my iphone and took a couple but they were far too fuzzy and just didn't capture what i was seeing so i used a real camera.These are pics that were shot with my canon-eos-70d with a tamron zoom lens attached.It was weird taking pics in the direction of my neighbors house but i just had to, it was so close and so visible.When i first saw it,i waited to see if it was a plane ,had blinking lights,seemed to be moving and of course make sure it wasn't just  a star.It was something totally different!!!!! this object had very bright glowing lights which seem to hover and fall.A collection of orbs illuminated it ,i'm guessing surface lights or something.The way it moved was captured in the enclosed pics because i honestly cant describe its movement other than i already have.At first i thought it was chevron shaped but then as it moved it looked totally different.It seemed to turn over a couple of times as it watched.I was in awe!Not my first sighting but these are the best pics i've captured and the first clear enough to see(zoom in on each for a clearer look at its structure).As the sky started to lighten , i ran back upstairs to wake my husband so he could see it but when we looked for it,it had disappeared completely.This all happened within 30 minutes or so this morning.What a way to start the year!!!Happy 2016!
content.summary: Ufo sighting in iowa with pictures,on january 1,2016.

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up around 5am and went outside where i saw a bright light, almost like head beams. this happened on 1/1/16. i thought nothing of it until about 10 minutes passed and it seemed like it was heading straight up until it disappeared then down. it stayed there for a while then repeatedly did the same thing. around 7 i went back outside and the object wasn't as bright and seemed higher in the sky but yet was in the same spot. it eventually faded out then never came back. it was yellowish and had a flashing red light.

the following day i went out at 5am and saw it again 1/2/16.  this time brighter and it had red and green flashing lights. it was stationary this time. from the corner of my eye i saw something moving and realized the second object was a satellite. it passed over the stationary object and kept going. around 6:40am i went back outside and the object was still stationary but not as bright.

after filming some of it, i went inside and took screenshots of the video and noticed it was like a disk shape. no color in the middle but lights around it. it also changed many colors.

i don't feel any different just curious and a little startled. planes move, helicopters wouldn't be stationary that long and a satellite moves like the one i saw. im just curious what it could be.
content.summary: Stationary for 2 hours. bright lights faded in and out

content.detailedDescription: Witness a approved the following statement:  “at about 7:30 pm one evening about six weeks  ago, my friend and i were sitting in her sun room in her house in prior lake watching tv, when a bright circular object above the tall grass in a swampy area about 400 feet away attracted her attention.  she called it to my attention. this object, about five or six feet in diameter, was rising up and moving to the left at an angle.  as it rose it emitted two similar but smaller objects, each perhaps a foot and a half in diameter, which moved to each side of the first object, and the three flew off together in formation in a northeast direction until they were out of sight.  the objects were all a red-orange color and not quite as bright as the full harvest moon.”
content.summary: 6 ft diameter red-orange glowing ball sighted over marsh, rose, emitted two smaller spheres & the three flew off together.

content.detailedDescription: Camino a bucaramanga estaba amaneciendo observe esta luz en el cañón del chicamocha y saque mi celular cuando vi q empezó a elevarse y no lo vi mas
content.summary: Camino a bucaramanga observe la luz ascender y desaparecer en cañón del chicamocha

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother were walking along the waterfront in victoria getting ready for new years eve when i spotted 2 orange lights flying one in front of the other aprox a mile to 3 miles away maybe a thousand feet high i pointed to them and my mother stopped and starred at them i immediately grabbed my iphone out but the camera could not pick up the lights so i ran towards the objects they were now hovering over the water then they shot backwards slightly and then forwards again they got smaller to the point were they almost disappeared then they appeared again in the larger form then they started to fly again i was watching them to the west and they were flying towards the south i ran behind a building to try and follow them but they disappeared i would say this event lasted anywere from 10 to 15 mins i was completely shocked i noticed a few people in there cars pointing to the objects as well after the objects disappeared i became very emotional and depressed i can not get the objects out of my mind i don't know what they were and i am telling the truth 100% i saw what i saw
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple lights over pacific ocean

content.detailedDescription: While driving east bound on textile road we noticed an object hovering over the road near textile and cherrywood dr. the portion of the object that was visible was orange in color however in total it looked that it was much lager with the majority of the object shrouded in a mist. my wife felt that the object was higher in the sky well above the trees but i perceived it to be only feet above the road at treetop level of just below treetop level. we drove directly under the glowing area of the object and i looked at it carefully as i slowed the car. the glowing portion of the object was very obscured and displaying multiple colors. i think the best way to describe it would be as if you were looking through a lens shrouded in a mist which refracted the light into a rainbow of colors. my observation was that i perceived an appendage or mast that protruded from this area of the object and i believe it was generating the mist that shrouded the rest of the object, there looked to be a lot going on with changing shapes, patterns and colors. again i believe the object was only 20 to 30 feet above us at this time. i pulled our car into cherrywood dr. and my son and i exited to get a better look however the object was gone. my wife at this time expressed concern that a man on the sidewalk was staring at us so we got back in the car, turned  it around, turned right back onto textile road and continued eastbound along textile road. as we were turning back onto textile we acquired the object again only this time it was east of us traveling north crossing over textile road. watching the object as we drove along the highway it changed direction and began traveling in a northeasterly direction. it was traveling slowly and was darting from side to side as it moved in a northeasterly direction. judging size and distance was difficult as my wife believes it was much higher in the sky whereas i'm certain it could not have been much higher than 30 feet above us. very weird and very strange.
content.summary: Observed a glowing orange object above textile road while driving east along textile road.

content.detailedDescription: Was in bed when fireworks noise from new years woke us. kept seeing firework flashes through the windows on the south side of the house, so decided to get up. neighbors to the east were setting off firework mortars. went to the french doors on east side of house to get a better look. did get a better view of the neighbors fireworks and also noticed flashes of light to the northeast as if more fireworks were being set off. was watching in this area when i noticed a yellow-white object, with yellow-orange perimeter come into view beyond the corner of the house near a pine tree. it was just there! my first impression was a fireworks mortar that had been fired in a northerly direction. instead of exploding it got brighter as if it was an aircraft landing light making a coarse correction for an approach to geiger airport to the west of spokane. in relation to the pine tree it hadn't moved much from where i had first seen it. then it made a clock-wise hook to the north, which gave me the impression it could be a helicopter. but, then it just faded like a dimmer switch being turned down, leaving a dull gray light like a bulb on a dimmer switch, but it still had the yellow-orange perimeter. then it just faded out. i was still watching the area, wondering what had just happened, when i noticed what looked like a strobe at great distance in that it was very dim, in the same area. i mentioned to my wife what i had just seen, that the light had just disappeared. i continued to watch the area and observed the strobing light three or four more times when the light came back, again like a dimmer switch had been turned on, after about 30 sec. the impression it gave me was of a helicopter turning on its axis or possibly a quad drone doing the same. it stayed stationary for about another 30 sec. so i called my wife over to see. we watched it together for another 30 sec.Commenting on how odd it was behaving and the odd color as it was not the color of an aircraft landing light nor as bright.10 or 15 sec. later another similar light appeared below and behind the first light. they both stayed stationary for another 10 to 15 seconds then started moving in a southwesterly direction. at this point i stepped outside to see if i could hear anything, but all that i could hear was the fireworks. i thought with the proximity of the lights, if it was helicopters i should have heard the rotors but again all that i could hear was the fireworks. as they were moving southwest across the peak of the house i lost sight of them near the spruce tree in front of the house. i went back inside and went out the front door hoping to see them again. i briefly saw the trailing light before it went behind the spruce. i went back inside to the west windows but could not see the lights again as the west neighbors trees were in the way. again,no aircraft sound as they headed southwest between brown's mountain on the south hill and downtown spokane. the sky was crystal clear, no clouds visible, half moon in the east. the whole thing lasted about 4 minutes.
content.summary: At first, thought it was a fireworks mortar

content.detailedDescription: In gatineau/ottawa around 0:15 on jan. 1st local time. saw what i thought was jet fighters with afterburner (could explain speed and brigthness/color even through clouds. i'm used to planes landing here and it didn't look like a typical landing path, or a typical plane with lights on. three bright orange lights traveling fairly quickly (vs typical planes) one after the other with maybe 30 secs/1 mins seperation between then following the same path. was able to see all three at one moment. coming from the west, going east/southeast. consistant speed, maybe twice or three time as fast as typical planes assuming same altitude. the fact thatvit was noiseless was the first hint that it wasn't your typical airliner. i've seen many planes using the same flight path before and it was completely different. very bright through clouds and too fast without noise are the only indications that it wasn't a typical plane. assuming rockets or jet fighters but can't explain some factors.
content.summary: 3 bright orange lights following each other in line formation with a minute between
